reviews.text: It was late at night and we just wanted room to sleep for a few hours. Unfortunately, I’ve slept in a sleeping bag on a rocky ground that was more comfortable! I think this mattress was made early in the last century!! Our son even asked how much we paid for this room. The room was clean enough that I did not have to keep one eye open for crawlers, but it wouldn’t have mattered with the condition of the beds. Although, I don’t think I would have allowed anyone to sleep on the floor. If you want an inexpensive night and don’t care about sleeping comforts then this hotel is for you.
reviews.title: Never Again!!

reviews.text: I'm not really sure why the reviews are good, the place is really old and run down. The manager was friendly, convenient location, but the place was a dump. The room looked clean, but yet didn't feel clean. The housekeeper was very nosy. After checking in, I left to get lunch, and took my duffle bag with me as I always do. Sorry housekeeping, I just dont trust ya with my things! As I was walking to my car the housekeeper yelled down to me and asked if I was checking out? Um, no. I guess if you're just passing through it would be okay for a night, but I'd never stay here again.
reviews.title: Run Down Dump

reviews.text: We have stayed in other places in Spartanburg and wanted a motel that was close to the car. The room was clean and the establishment wasn't right next to a busy noisy road. Check in was smooth and the staff was ver friendly. We did have problems with the internet hookup but they said the wireless would work great for our trip this May 2009.
reviews.title: Good place to stay and great location!

reviews.text: This place should have gotten 2 stars, but because the staff is so great and friendly it is 3.
reviews.title: Great staff, but ...

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: It is used and shows it’s age, especially in bathroom. The doors & frames (entry & bath) have countless black fingerprints all over. The towels are very thin and worn out and should have been retired long, long time ago. The bed is hard and not very supportive (king). The TV selection is great with all the channels you will find on local cable & HBO.
reviews.title: Great Value & Great Stay

likes.liked: — The staff were great, quick easy check in and they allowed us to check out 2 hours beyond regular time

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Good, very basic motel, offering good value.
reviews.title: Good Value

reviews.text: My family stayed at this motel while visiting us.
reviews.title: Excellent Days Inn

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The rooms were very clean, and the staff was very friendly. Everything is new and up-to-date. I couldn't have asked for a nicer Days Inn.
reviews.title: Best Days Inn I've stayed at

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed at this hotel, along with 10 others, during April 2012 as part of a 17 day road trip across GA, NC, SC. By giving the star rating I am not saying the hotel is a 1 star but whether it was clean and value for the money and to an extent we have compared then to the other 10 hotels we stayed at.
reviews.title: Never Again

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This was the motel type where your room door opens onto the car park and maybe is not as safe as a traditional hotel. On the other hand you can park directly outside your room and just be careful.
reviews.title: Clean, great value

reviews.text: On arrival we were allocated a king bedded room which tends to give more space than a twin queen size bedded room.
reviews.title: Horrid.

reviews.text: The room, 117, was terrible with badly stained carpets, chair and bed covers and also badly maintained. The TV was too blurry to watch, the basin plug was jammed so the water would not drain, the bathroom (toilet/shower part) was tiny and the one of the towels seemed to have makeup on it (I don't think it had been washed) I would not have stayed except the bed linen and the rest of the towels seemed ok and we were only there for one night.
reviews.title: I'd rather sleep in a dumpster

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The included breakfast was the usual offering of cereal, toast and coffee and just about OK.
reviews.title: Great deal
